description: MainActivity.kt defines the MainActivity class for an Android app, handling UI interactions for displaying, searching, and navigating notes in a notes app.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity manages the main user interface for notes, including displaying the list, search functionality, and navigation to edit notes.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up views, adapters, and event listeners.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Reloads notes when the activity resumes, ensuring the list is current.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from repository based on the search query and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: onNoteClicked
methods.description: Handles click events on notes, navigating to the edit note activity.
